comment: Dr.J is awesome. She will give you the grade you deserve based on your effort. She is funny, and very smart. If you show interest and do the work you will get an A and have a great experience under your belt. She is always willing to work with you and help you. Favorite TPS professor ever.

Amazing teacher! Inspiring and funny, her lectures will always stick in your head. Shes a great professor just to talk to and will provide you with many outside opportunities. Overall my favorite teacher ever.

I've taken three classes with Dr. J, all stellar. This woman is a GEM. She's hard. She'll make you work, but it's always rewarding. I have learned more under her than any other teacher at KSU. She is worth her weight in gold, hilarious, entertaining, and overall A GREAT TEACHER
Dr. J is devoted, brilliant and thoughtful. Her class was challenging and difficult, but I do not regret it at all. There is no teacher I respect more than her.

Dr. J rules. There are times when the class in challenging...but in a good way. There are a lot of online quizzes because you read a lot of plays but as long as you read it you are set. She is so fun though and her class was my favorite my freshman year. Recommended! Grasshoppers forever ps i did this again because the ratings i made were wrong

Very entertaining teacher and pretty informed. A little flighty, but not a bad professor at all. You REALLY have to go to class and take GOOD notes, but she makes a gen/ed class a lot of fun and pretty easy.

Dr. J is so much fun! She makes class interesting, and isn't afraid to call you out if you're causing trouble.  Def pick TPS1107 and her over art or music.  She's great. Pay attention in class, do extra credit, and simply TRY and you'll have an A.  SO MUCH FUN! Dr. J is one of the best profs I've ever had

This class is what you make of it!!!  If you attend class, pay attention, and participate you will do well.  If not, why are you in college??? Dr. J is awesome!!!  She is engaging and witty and makes the class!!!  If you don't like theatre you will love this class!!!

Dr. J is DA BOMB!!!!!!!  Seriously, you can get an A in this class by, showing up, paying attention and following the very few SIMPLE rules laid out... oh yeah, put the games, FaceBook and other such things away!!! She will figure you out... and CALL YOU OUT to the amusement of those that are paying attention to HER...just for funsies!
Dr. J was so much fun.  She was so funny and made a class that could have potentially boring, a blast.

She's awesome!! Really funny and sarcastic! Basically just show up, take notes when it's a lecture day and do extra credit. It's an easy A if you put forth some effort. She's an awesome teacher and really makes the class fun!

Dr J is a wonderful professor.  If you ask for help she is glad to give it.  Just do the assignments and you will be fine.  Big sticking point for her is be on time to her class!  Not just on time, but a few minutes early!  LOVE LOVE her!
Dr. Barnette is wonderful. She has a great personality and loves teaching. Come to class and take notes! Lots of group activities - don't worry if you don't know anyone, she assigns. :-)

she was a great teacher and we had alot of fun in her class. The final project involves groups doing a play but it was alot of fun. Take her class and try to go because all of the test questions are from the notes.
